mechanics.condition: Target has at least one level of exhaustion
mechanics.outcome: Target's exhaustion level is reduced by one
One effect causing the charmed condition on the target ends
One effect causing the petrified condition on the target ends

mechanics.condition: Target is affected by a curse OR Target is attuned to a cursed magic item
mechanics.outcome: One curse affecting the target ends OR Target's attunement to one cursed magic item ends

mechanics.condition: Target has an effect reducing at least one of its ability scores
mechanics.outcome: All effects causing reduction to one chosen ability score of the target end

mechanics.condition: Target has an effect reducing its hit point maximum
mechanics.outcome: One effect reducing the target's hit point maximum ends

description_text: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect. You can reduce the target's exhaustion level by one, or end one of the following effects on the target: One effect that charmed or petrified the target, One curse, including the target's attunement to a cursed magic item, Any reduction to one of the target's ability scores, One effect reducing the target's hit point maximum
